extension.description: Language support for Catapillar (.cat) â€” a multilingual DSL with Chinese and English keywords
configuration.title: Catapillar
configuration.pythonPath: Path to the Python interpreter used for transpilation and execution
configuration.projectRoot: For Run and Debug: use Catapillar repo root (folder with tools/catapillar.py). Empty = workspace. Python on PATH required.
configuration.diagnostics.enable: Enable real-time syntax checking and error diagnostics
configuration.formatting.indentSize: Number of spaces for indentation when formatting (0 = no indentation, Catapillar is indent-free by design)
configuration.completion.showChineseKeyw: Show Chinese keyword variants in auto-completion
configuration.completion.showEnglishKeyw: Show English keyword variants in auto-completion
configuration.debug.printAst: AST dump when running: off (no dump), summary (one-line), full (full AST JSON)
debug.program: Absolute path to the .cat file to run
debug.mode: Execution mode: auto (detect), python (transpile to Python), flow (runtime engine)
debug.catapillarRoot: Path to the Catapillar project root
debug.stopOnEntry: Stop execution at the first line
debug.snippet.run: Run and debug a Catapillar .cat file
debug.snippet.transpile: Transpile a .cat file to Python and run it
